attributes.action: Offer a Knighthood to Nigel Farage.
attributes.additional_details: He, more than any other individual, is responsible for the fact the the British electorate were finally given a referendum on the subject. The British electorate voted decisively to LEAVE and we wish to honour the individual who fought for this cause with every fibre of his being.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage deserves to be honoured for his  contribution to British political life in respect of his opposition to Britain's continued membership of the anti democratic and corrupt EU.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
